    protected DungTheory
    AbstractAnalysis.createDAF(EAFTheory eafTheory)

    Method
    Description
    protected EAFTheory
    DAFToEAFConverter.convert(DungTheory dungTheory)
    Generates EAFTheory objects with only attacks from the given DungTheory object It is up to the implementations to decide what will be the supports (including eta supporting others)
    EAFTheory
    EtaToAllConverter.convert(DungTheory dungTheory)
    Converts DungTheory object to EAFTheory by adding supports from eta to all other arguments.
    EAFTheory

    Converts a DungTheory object into EAFTheory object while creating a tree support structure.
    Methods in org.tweetyproject.arg.peaf.evaluation.converters with parameters of type EAFTheory
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static PEAFTheory
    EAFToPEAFConverter.convert(EAFTheory eafTheory, double probability)
    Generates a PEAF from an EAF where all relations have the same probability
    static PEAFTheory
    EAFToPEAFConverter.convert(EAFTheory eafTheory, int alphaSupp, int betaSupp)
    Generates a PEAF from an EAF where `supp ~ Beta(alphaSupp, betaSupp)` and `att ~ Beta(alphaAtt, betaAtt)` `supp` is the probability of each support relation.
    static PEAFTheory
    EAFToPEAFConverter.convert(EAFTheory eafTheory, Supplier<Double> supportSupplier)
